original_text: I know that you want very much to return to your father's house. That is why you have left my home. But why did you take my idols?’
korean_text: 이제 네가 네 아버지 집을 사모하여 돌아가려는 것은 옳거니와 어찌 내 신을 도둑질하였느냐

sentences.original_text: I know that you want very much to return to your father's house.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 아버지 집으로 돌아가고 싶어 한다는 것을 안다.

sentences.original_text: That is why you have left my home.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 네가 내 집을 떠난 이유다.

sentences.original_text: But why did you take my idols?
